narrative:
This was the 1st Pre-License inspection for a USDA Class “C" license.  Applicant has met the licensure
requirements for a Class "C" license.  Total number of AWA animals was 20.   Inspection and exit briefing
conducted on-site with applicant.
The applicant will submit the license fee of $75.00 directly to:
USDA/APHIS/Animal Care
2150 Centre Avenue
Building B, 3W11
Fort Collins, CO 80526
The new license will be issued by the Regional Office after the fee is received and processed through normal
banking procedures. Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal
Welfare Act.
NO USDA REGULATED ACTIVITIES MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL THE USDA LICENSE HAS BEEN ISSUED
